All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AlreadyStartedException
 
Animation
This class is a list of Textures that can be used to make animated Sprites.
Animator
This class is used to animate a texture
AudioClip
A instance of an audio file, an implementation of RelativePath.
AudioClipException
 
AudioClipPos
This class servers the purpose of giving a time position to an audio clip in an audio player.
AudioPlayer
It's a class that plays audio clips.
AudioPlayerException
 
AudioUtils
 
CannotLoadException
 
ChangeScene
 
CircleCollider
It's a circle collider that extends the Collider class
Collider
It's a base class for all colliders
Color
A color stored in a separated RGB values.
Colors
A collection of some basic colors.
Component
This class is a script for Entities, and is made to modify them.
Condition
A Condition is a boolean value that can be set and retrieved.
EdgeCollider
It's a collider that represents a line
Engine
This class is used to create a game loop.
EngineController
 
EngineStop
 
Entity
An Entity is a combination of Components and other Entities(called children), can contain game logic and be displayed on the screen.
EntitySystem
It's a system that only processes entities that contain the components specified in the entityContains() method
ESCExitSystem
If the user presses the escape key, exit the game.
ExceptionThrower
 
FileUtils
 
Filter
 
GameConfiguration
This is the standard configuration class used to launch YldGames, all the properties can be modified.
GameHandler
It's the class that handles the game loop
ImmutableBreakException
 
ImmutableColor
It's a color that can't be changed.
ImpulseType
 
Ini
It reads an ini file and sets the values of the given object
IntColor
It's a Color class that takes integer values for the red, green, blue, and alpha components
InvalidTextureTypeException
 
Key
This class contains all the mapped keys that can be used in a game.
Line
It draws a line from the top left corner of the shape to the bottom right corner of the shape
MappedTiles
 
Material
This is the main class that will set how a Entity looks, by setting its color or Texture.
Material.Shape
Deprecated.
MiddlePointSystem
 
MissingException
 
MissingPhysicsSystemException
 
MissingRenderMasterException
 
MissingWindowPrintException
 
MultiThread
 
MyGame
 
NonFillShape
It's a shape that can't be filled.
NotSupportedException
 
Oval
It's a shape that draws an oval
PhysicsBody
It's a class that allows you to add physics to your entities
PhysicsBodyType
 
PhysicsContactListener
It calls the appropriate methods on the components of the entities involved in the collision
PhysicsSystem
 
Pixel
It's a class that represents a pixel
PixelGrid
It's a 2D array of pixels that wraps around the edges
Prefab
A preset that is used to create multiple entities.
ProcessSystem
This is an implementation of YldSystem that process every Component in a YldScene instance.
RayCast
It's a callback that is used to get information about a ray-cast
Rectangle
It's a rectangle that can be drawn on the screen.
RectCollider
It's a rectangle collider
RectOffEdges
It creates a rectangle collider that is made of lines.
RelativeFile
It's a wrapper for an input stream that can be closed
RenderMaster
This is an interface to handle rendering, audio and files.
RendException
 
RoundedRectangle
It's a rectangle with rounded corners
SampleGraphics
 
SampleWindow
 
Save
It saves and loads data
SaveFile
It's a subclass of RelativeFile that represents a save file
Shape
Shape is a NonFillShape that can be filled.
SimpleRenderable
It renders the entity with a rotation and a color
SimpleSystem
 
Spacial
 
Sprite
A Sprite is a NonFillShape that renders a texture
SystemCreateMethod
 
Text
It's a NonFillShape that renders text
Texture
A Texture is an image for a game, can be added to graphical objects to display images.
TexType
 
Tile
A tile is a texture with a size and an offset
TileGen
It's a class that generates tiles
TileMap
It's a class that renders a tile map
TileSet
It's a getter for common tiles.
TilesToCompare
It's a class that holds the tiles that are to be compared to the current tile
Transform
 
TransformSave
This class is a SaveFile that saves a Transform.
UpdateSystem
This class is an implementation of YldSystem, is made to process on every update of a YldScene.
Vector
It's a Vector2 from a module and an angle.
Vector2
It's a class that represents a 2D vector
View
The resolution of the actual Yield Game Engine.
VisualUtils
 
WindowConfiguration
 
WindowConfiguration.WindowPos
 
WindowPrint
 
YieldEngineException
 
Yld
A class that hold global properties and methods of Yield Game Engine
YldAction
 
YldB
Sample methods for the majority of the Yield Game Engine classes.
YldEngineAction
It's a wrapper for a YldAction that contains information about whether it should be repeated, and an id
YldFilter
 
YldGame
This class is the starting point for every Yield Game, it contains all the objects of the game.
YldGraphics
It's a class that helps you create graphical objects
YldInput
It's a class that handles input
YldPair<F,S>
It's a generic class that holds two objects of any type
YldScene
A YldScene is the base of a Yield game, it contains the Entities, YldGraphics and the Systems, it's used to alternate between game moments.
YldScript
A simpler way to write a Component
YldSystem
This is the primitive class that is used in the YldScene to store all the different types of Systems.
YldTime
An instance of this class is made to contain the time information of a YldGame.
YldTimeSystem
